title: Inside the Parker - Pitchers Cheating Scandal; Ohtani Moonshot; Cedric Mullins O's Surprise -- Guest: CJ Nitkowski on Pitch Doctoring
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Pitchers Cheating Scandal; Ohtani Moonshot; Cedric Mullins O's Surprise -- Guest: CJ Nitkowski on Pitch Doctoring
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks at the developing scandal of pitchers doctoring the ball with illegal substances, why Shohei Ohtani's 470-foot blast is the latest must see moment in a year full of them for the 2-way savant, and why O's centerfielder Cedric Mullins is Baltimore's only bright spot. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair.

Guests: Rangers Analyst and former MLB Pitcher CJ Nitkowski discusses the pitcher cheating scandal and his experiences using substances on the ball. MLB Writer Craig Calcaterra breaks down the AL and NL division races and biggest surprises as the All-Star break approaches.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
